tool_description: Workable, recruit people by creating beautiful job posts through an API
name: Workable
title: Workable

api_list.name: /candidates

parameters.name: candidate
parameters.description: Look at the example on the right hand side for all parameters

parameters.name: shortcode
parameters.description: The shortcode is a unique identifier for each jobs and can be seen by invoking  "/jobs"

utterances.utterance: Please add a new candidate named Emily Johnson with a resume link to the job identified by shortcode 'devops_engineer'.
I want to create a candidate profile for Michael Smith applying to the position with shortcode 'marketing_specialist'.
Add candidate Sarah Lee with her contact details for the job opening tagged as 'product_manager'.
Register a new candidate, David Brown, for the job with shortcode 'graphic_designer'.
Create a candidate entry for Anna Garcia applying to the 'data_scientist' role.
Please add John Miller as a candidate for the job with shortcode 'sales_representative'.
I need to submit a candidate named Olivia Davis for the position identified by shortcode 'hr_coordinator'.
Add candidate Ethan Wilson with his CV for the job tagged 'software_engineer'.
Please create a candidate profile for Mia Martinez applying to the 'content_writer' role.
Register a new candidate, Noah Anderson, for the job with shortcode 'customer_support'.
